title: If our Swain loses to Yasuo, who do we sacrifice him to?
body: Pretty straightforward. Who do we sacrifice him to if he loses this next game against a Yasuo?

replies.body: My constituents don't think Teemo is worthy of receiving a sacrifice, but they thank you for the idea.  He shall be used as a last resort if all else fails.
sacrifice him to me. I'll take it.
